product_name: INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount
long_description: If your mountain bike has a thru axle, and you also ride a road bike, choose the INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount. It fits both regular forks and thru axles thanks to the included adapters. Universal Mounting System fits square, round and most factory cross bars; frame is made of lightweight aluminum. Carrier includes 3 thru axle adapters for mountain bike compatibility: 9mm, 15mm, and 20mm. INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount includes a quick-release anti-theft guard. Rear tire Multi Cradle is compatible with both mountain and road bike tires; carrier includes lock and keys.
short_description: If your mountain bike has a thru axle, and you also ride a road bike, choose the INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount. It fits both regular forks and thru axles thanks to the included adapters.
